casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted. (See also No. 244, supra.)

No. 83. Regents of the University System of Georgia v. Carroll et al. Eugene Cook, Attorney General of Georgia, and Hamilton Lokey, Deputy Assistant Attorney General, for petitioner. James A. Branch for respondents. Solicitor General Perlman and Benedict P. Cot-tone filed a brief for the Federal Communications Commission, as amicus curiae, supporting the petition.

Court of Appeals of Georgia. Certiorari granted.
